boss.wrathy_armament.sashakyotoz.appeare: On the fourth day, nightmare were visualized
death.attack.wrathy_armament.phantom_sho: Causes splash, that hits mobs within radius of 6 blocks
item.wrathy_armament.blade_of_chaos_atta: Powerful attack, that launches enemies into air and fire them
Circular attack to set whole ord of enemies into dust
item.wrathy_armament.frostmourne_attack: Strike enemies by ray of frost souls to freeze and damage them
item.wrathy_armament.frostmourne_attack1: Killed undead enemy can arise to be your ally
item.wrathy_armament.game.master_sword: -Original from The Legend of Zelda series
item.wrathy_armament.half_zatoichi_attac: Hitting of enemy awards by regeneration, but switching of weapon takes it away
item.wrathy_armament.johannes_sword_dash: Push player forward to side of its view
item.wrathy_armament.johannes_sword_spea: Feel power of Johannes to spread spears above ground
item.wrathy_armament.left_hand: When player holds item in left hand:
item.wrathy_armament.master_sword_alter_: Turn owner of sword back in time
item.wrathy_armament.master_sword_attack: Strike enemy of sword owner by lighting bolt or fire
item.wrathy_armament.mistsplitter_attack: Time of rest of sword converts in power of next attack
item.wrathy_armament.murasama_attack: Each hit of enemy in combo modify speed of sword's owner, stacks to 30%
item.wrathy_armament.phantom_lancer_circ: Creates explosion, that hits nearby mobs
item.wrathy_armament.phantom_lancer_swee: Shoots wave of small phantoms in range of 16 blocks forward to player's view
item.wrathy_armament.right_hand: When player holds item in right hand:
item.wrathy_armament.zenith_ability: When swung, the sword sprites of its component swords fly towards enemies
